titleStmt.title: The Case of the captains of His Majesty's fleet humbly offer'd to the honourable House of Commons. It being generally believed, that the captains who have served in His Majesty's ships, during the late war with France, have been rewarded extra for their service by double pay, which on the contrary is of loss to the said captains, and a considerable summ saved to the nation.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament. House of Commons.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the California State Library, Sutro Branch.
